017package org.microbean.qualifier;
018
019import java.lang.constant.ClassDesc;
020import java.lang.constant.Constable;
021import java.lang.constant.ConstantDesc;
022import java.lang.constant.DynamicConstantDesc;
023import java.lang.constant.MethodHandleDesc;
024import java.lang.constant.MethodTypeDesc;
025
026import java.util.Iterator;
027import java.util.Map;
028import java.util.Map.Entry;
029import java.util.Objects;
030import java.util.Optional;
031import java.util.SortedMap;
032import java.util.TreeMap;
033
034import org.microbean.constant.Constables;
035
036import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.BSM_INVOKE;
037import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_Map;
038import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_Object;
039import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_String;
040import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.NULL;
041
042import static java.util.Collections.emptySortedMap;
043import static java.util.Collections.unmodifiableSortedMap;
044
045import static org.microbean.qualifier.ConstantDescs.CD_Comparable;
046
047/**
048 * An abstract {@linkplain #attributes() attributed} {@linkplain
049 * #name() name}-{@linkplain #value() value} pair.
050 *
051 * @param <V> the type of a {@link Binding}'s {@linkplain #value()
052 * value} and of its {@linkplain #attributes() attribute values}
053 *
054 * @param <B> the type of the subclass
055 *
056 * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson"
057 * target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
058 */
059public abstract class Binding<V, B extends Binding<V, B>> implements Comparable<B>, Constable {
060
061
062  /*
063   * Instance fields.
064   */
065
066
067  private final String name;
068
069  private final V value;
070
071  private final SortedMap<String, Object> attributes;
072
073  private final SortedMap<String, Object> info;
074
075
076  /*
077   * Constructors.
078   */
079
080
081  /**
082   * Creates a new {@link Binding}.
083   *
084   * @param name the name; must not be {@code null}
085   *
086   * @param value the value; may be {@code null}
087   *
088   * @param attributes further describing this {@link Binding}; may be
089   * {@code null}
090   *
091   * @param info informational attributes further describing this
092   * {@link Binding} that are not considered by its {@link
093   * #equals(Object)} implementation; may be {@code null}
094   *
095   * @see #name()
096   *
097   * @see #value()
098   *
099   * @see #attributes()
100   *
101   * @see #info()
102   */
103  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
104  protected Binding(final String name,
105                    final V value,
106                    final Map<? extends String, ?> attributes,
107                    final Map<? extends String, ?> info) {
108    super();
109    this.name = Objects.requireNonNull(name);
110    this.value = value;
111    if (attributes == null || attributes.isEmpty()) {
112      this.attributes = emptySortedMap();
113    } else {
114      this.attributes = unmodifiableSortedMap(new TreeMap<>(attributes));
115    }
116    if (info == null || info.isEmpty()) {
117      this.info = emptySortedMap();
118    } else {
119      final TreeMap<String, Object> map = new TreeMap<>();
120      for (final String key : info.keySet()) {
121        if (!this.attributes.containsKey(key)) {
122          map.put(key, info.get(key));
123        }
124      }
125      this.info = unmodifiableSortedMap(map);
126    }
127  }
128
129
130  /*
131   * Instance methods.
132   */
133
134
135  /**
136   * Returns the name of this {@link Binding}.
137   *
138   * @return the name of this {@link Binding}
139   *
140   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
141   *
142   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
143   *
144   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
145   * threads.
146   */
147  public final String name() {
148    return this.name;
149  }
150
151  /**
152   * Returns the value of this {@link Binding}, which may be {@code
153   * null}.
154   *
155   * @return the value of this {@link Binding}
156   *
157   * @nullability This method may return {@code null}.
158   *
159   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
160   *
161   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
162   * threads.
163   */
164  public final V value() {
165    return this.value;
166  }
167
168  /**
169   * Returns an immutable {@link SortedMap} representing any
170   * attributes further describing this {@link Binding}.
171   *
172   * <p>The attributes are considered by the {@link #equals(Object)}
173   * method.</p>
174   *
175   * @return the attributes of this {@link Binding}
176   *
177   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
178   *
179   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
180   *
181   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
182   * threads.
183   */
184  public final SortedMap<String, Object> attributes() {
185    return this.attributes;
186  }
187
188  /**
189   * Returns an immutable {@link SortedMap} representing any
190   * informational-only attributes further describing this {@link
191   * Binding}.
192   *
193   * <p>The attributes are not considered by the {@link
194   * #equals(Object)} method.</p>
195   *
196   * @return the informational attributes of this {@link Binding}
197   *
198   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
199   *
200   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
201   *
202   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
203   * threads.
204   */
205  public final SortedMap<String, Object> info() {
206    return this.info;
207  }
208
209  /**
210   * Returns an {@link Optional} housing a {@link ConstantDesc}
211   * describing this {@link Binding}, if this {@link Binding} is
212   * capable of being represented as a <a
213   * href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/17/docs/api/java.base/java/lang/invoke/package-summary.html#condycon">dynamic
214   * constant</a>, or an {@linkplain Optional#isEmpty() empty} {@link
215   * Optional} if not.
216   *
217   * @return an {@link Optional} housing a {@link ConstantDesc}
218   * describing this {@link Binding}, if this {@link Binding} is
219   * capable of being represented as a <a
220   * href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/17/docs/api/java.base/java/lang/invoke/package-summary.html#condycon">dynamic
221   * constant</a>, or an {@linkplain Optional#isEmpty() empty} {@link
222   * Optional} if not
223   *
224   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
225   *
226   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
227   *
228   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
229   * threads.
230   *
231   * @see #describeConstructor()
232   *
233   * @see <a
234   * href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/17/docs/api/java.base/java/lang/invoke/package-summary.html#condycon">Dynamically-computed
235   * constants</a>
236   */
237  @Override // Constable
238  public Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> describeConstable() {
239    final MethodHandleDesc constructor = this.describeConstructor();
240    if (constructor == null) {
241      return Optional.empty();
242    }
243    final V value = this.value();
244    final ConstantDesc valueCd;
245    if (value == null) {
246      valueCd = NULL;
247    } else if (value instanceof Constable c) {
248      valueCd = c.describeConstable().orElse(null);
249    } else if (value instanceof ConstantDesc cd) {
250      valueCd = cd;
251    } else {
252      return Optional.empty();
253    }
254    final ConstantDesc attributesCd = Constables.describeConstable(this.attributes()).orElse(null);
255    if (attributesCd == null) {
256      return Optional.empty();
257    }
258    final ConstantDesc infoCd = Constables.describeConstable(this.info()).orElse(null);
259    if (infoCd == null) {
260      return Optional.empty();
261    }
262    return
263      Optional.of(DynamicConstantDesc.of(BSM_INVOKE, constructor, this.name(), valueCd, attributesCd, infoCd));
264  }
265
266  /**
267   * Returns a {@link MethodHandleDesc} describing the constructor or
268   * {@code static} method that will be used to create a <a
269   * href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/17/docs/api/java.base/java/lang/invoke/package-summary.html#condycon">dynamic
270   * constant</a> representing this {@link Binding}.
271   *
272   * @return a {@link MethodHandleDesc} describing the constructor or
273   * {@code static} method that will be used to create a <a
274   * href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/17/docs/api/java.base/java/lang/invoke/package-summary.html#condycon">dynamic
275   * constant</a> representing this {@link Binding}
276   *
277   * @nullability This method does not, and its overrides must not,
278   * return {@code null}.
279   *
280   * @idempotency This method is, and its overrides must be,
281   * idempotent and deterministic.
282   *
283   * @threadsafety This method is, and its overrides must be, safe for
284   * concurrent use by multiple threads.
285   */
286  protected MethodHandleDesc describeConstructor() {
287    return
288      MethodHandleDesc.ofConstructor(this.getClass().describeConstable().orElseThrow(),
289                                     new ClassDesc[] { CD_String, CD_Object, CD_Map, CD_Map });
290  }
291
292  /**
293   * Returns a hashcode for this {@link Binding} that represents its
294   * {@linkplain #name() name}, {@linkplain #value() value} and
295   * {@linkplain #attributes() attributes}.
296   *
297   * <p>A subclass that overrides this method must also override the
298   * {@link #equals(Object)} and {@link #compareTo(Binding)}
299   * methods accordingly.</p>
300   *
301   * @return a hashcode for this {@link Binding}
302   *
303   * @idempotency This method is, and its overrides must be,
304   * idempotent and deterministic.
305   *
306   * @threadsafety This method is, and its overrides must be, safe for
307   * concurrent use by multiple threads.
308   *
309   * @see #equals(Object)
310   *
311   * @see #compareTo(Binding)
312   */
313  @Override // Object
314  public int hashCode() {
315    int hashCode = 17;
316
317    Object v = this.name();
318    int c = v == null ? 0 : v.hashCode();
319    hashCode = 37 * hashCode + c;
320
321    v = this.value();
322    c = v == null ? 0 : v.hashCode();
323    hashCode = 37 * hashCode + c;
324
325    v = this.attributes();
326    c = v == null ? 0 : v.hashCode();
327    hashCode = 37 * hashCode + c;
328
329    return hashCode;
330  }
331
332  /**
333   * Returns an {@code int} representing a {@linkplain
334   * Comparable#compareTo(Object) comparison} of this {@link Binding}
335   * with the supplied {@link Binding}, by considering the {@linkplain
336   * #name() names}, {@linkplain #value() values} and {@linkplain
337   * #attributes() attributes} of both {@link Binding}s.
338   *
339   * <p>Any {@linkplain #attributes() attribute values} that are not
340   * {@link Comparable} instances will be compared based on their
341   * {@linkplain Object#toString() string representations}.  It is
342   * strongly recommended that {@linkplain #attributes() attribute
343   * values} implement {@link Comparable}.</p>
344   *
345   * <p>This method is, and its overrides must be, {@linkplain
346   * Comparable consistent with equals}.</p>
347   *
348   * <p>A subclass that overrides this method must also override the
349   * {@link #hashCode()} and {@link #equals(Object)} methods
350   * accordingly.</p>
351   *
352   * @param other the other {@link Binding}; may be {@code null} in
353   * which case a negative value will be returned
354   *
355   * @return an {@code int} representing a {@linkplain
356   * Comparable#compareTo(Object) comparison} of this {@link Binding}
357   * with the supplied {@link Binding}
358   *
359   * @idempotency This method is, and its overrides must be,
360   * idempotent and deterministic.
361   *
362   * @threadsafety This method is, and its overrides must be, safe for
363   * concurrent use by multiple threads.
364   *
365   * @see #hashCode()
366   *
367   * @see #equals(Object)
368   */
369  @Override // Comparable<B>
370  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
371  public int compareTo(final B other) {
372    if (other == null) {
373      return -1;
374    } else if (this.equals(other)) {
375      return 0;
376    } else {
377      int cmp = this.name().compareTo(other.name());
378      if (cmp == 0) {
379        Object myValue = this.value();
380        Object otherValue = other.value();
381        if (value == null) {
382          if (otherValue == null) {
383            cmp = 0;
384          }
385          cmp = 1;
386        } else if (otherValue == null) {
387          cmp = -1;
388        } else if (myValue instanceof Comparable) {
389          try {
390            cmp = ((Comparable<Object>)myValue).compareTo(otherValue);
391          } catch (final ClassCastException ohWell) {
392          }
393        }
394        if (cmp == 0) {
395          cmp = String.valueOf(this.value()).compareTo(String.valueOf(other.value())); // NOTE
396          if (cmp == 0) {
397            final SortedMap<String, Object> myAttributes = this.attributes();
398            final SortedMap<String, Object> otherAttributes = other.attributes();
399            cmp = Integer.compare(myAttributes.size(), otherAttributes.size());
400            if (cmp == 0) {
401              final Iterator<Entry<String, Object>> myEntries = myAttributes.entrySet().iterator();
402              final Iterator<Entry<String, Object>> otherEntries = otherAttributes.entrySet().iterator();
403              while (myEntries.hasNext()) {
404                final Entry<String, ?> myEntry = myEntries.next();
405                final Entry<String, ?> otherEntry = otherEntries.next();
406                cmp = myEntry.getKey().compareTo(otherEntry.getKey());
407                if (cmp == 0) {
408                  myValue = myEntry.getValue();
409                  otherValue = otherEntry.getValue();
410                  if (myValue == null) {
411                    if (otherValue == null) {
412                      continue;
413                    }
414                    cmp = 1;
415                  } else if (otherValue == null) {
416                    cmp = -1;
417                  } else if (myValue instanceof Comparable) {
418                    try {
419                      cmp = ((Comparable<Object>)myValue).compareTo(otherValue);
420                    } catch (final ClassCastException ohWell) {
421                    }
422                  }
423                  if (cmp == 0) {
424                    cmp = String.valueOf(myEntry.getValue()).compareTo(String.valueOf(otherEntry.getValue())); // NOTE
425                    if (cmp == 0) {
426                      continue;
427                    }
428                  }
429                }
430                break;
431              }
432            }
433          }
434        }
435      }
436      assert cmp != 0; // or equals() was badly implemented
437      return cmp;
438    }
439  }
440
441  /**
442   * Returns {@code true} if the supplied {@link Object} is equal to
443   * this {@link Binding}.
444   *
445   * <p>The supplied {@link Object} is considered to be equal to this
446   * {@link Binding} if and only if:</p>
447   *
448   * <ul>
449   *
450   * <li>Its {@linkplain #getClass() class} is identical to this
451   * {@link Binding}'s {@linkplain #getClass() class}, and</li>
452   *
453   * <li>Its {@linkplain #name() name} {@linkplain
454   * String#equals(Object) is equal to} this {@link Binding}'s
455   * {@linkplain #name() name}, and</li>
456   *
457   * <li>Its {@linkplain #value() value} {@linkplain
458   * Object#equals(Object) is equal to} this {@link Binding}'s
459   * {@linkplain #value() value}, and</li>
460   *
461   * <li>Its {@linkplain #attributes() attributes} {@linkplain
462   * Map#equals(Object) are equal to} this {@link Binding}'s
463   * {@linkplain #attributes() attributes}</li>
464   *
465   * </ul>
466   *
467   * <p>A subclass that overrides this method must also override the
468   * {@link #hashCode()} and {@link #compareTo(Binding)} methods
469   * accordingly.</p>
470   *
471   * @param other the {@link Object} to test; may be {@code null} in
472   * which case {@code false} will be returned
473   *
474   * @return {@code true} if the supplied {@link Object} is equal to
475   * this {@link Binding}
476   *
477   * @idempotency This method is, and its overrides must be,
478   * idempotent and deterministic.
479   *
480   * @threadsafety This method is, and its overrides must be, safe for
481   * concurrent use by multiple threads.
482   *
483   * @see #hashCode()
484   *
485   * @see #compareTo(Binding)
486   */
487  @Override // Object
488  public boolean equals(final Object other) {
489    if (this == other) {
490      return true;
491    } else if (other != null && other.getClass() == this.getClass()) {
492      final Binding<?, ?> her = (Binding<?, ?>)other;
493      return
494        Objects.equals(this.name(), her.name()) &&
495        Objects.equals(this.value(), her.value()) &&
496        Objects.equals(this.attributes(), her.attributes());
497    } else {
498      return false;
499    }
500  }
501
502  /**
503   * Returns a {@link String} representation of this {@link Binding}.
504   *
505   * <p>The format of the returned {@link String} is deliberately
506   * undefined and may change between versions of this class without
507   * prior notice.</p>
508   *
509   * @return a {@link String} representation of this {@link Binding}
510   *
511   * @nullability This method does not, and its overrides must not,
512   * return {@code null}.
513   *
514   * @idempotency This method is, and its overrides must be,
515   * idempotent and deterministic.
516   *
517   * @threadsafety This method is, and its overrides must be, safe for
518   * concurrent use by multiple threads.
519   */
520  @Override // Object
521  public String toString() {
522    final StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(this.name()).append('=').append(this.value());
523    final Map<?, ?> attributes = this.attributes();
524    if (!attributes.isEmpty()) {
525      sb.append(' ').append(attributes);
526    }
527    final Map<?, ?> info = this.info();
528    if (!info.isEmpty()) {
529      sb.append(" (").append(info).append(')');
530    }
531    return sb.toString();
532  }
533
534}
